subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|疒|t1=sickness|丙|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – illness. Note that {{lang|zh|丙}} also means “fire”, hence connotations of “lying feverishly in bed”.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[illness]]; [[sickness]]; [[disease]]
# [[evil]]; [[ill]]s
# [[fault]]; [[flaw]]
# to [[fall]] ill; to be [[sick]]; to be [[ill]]
# to [[worry]]; to be [[anxious]]
#* {{zh-x|子 曰：「君子 病 無能 焉，不 病 人 之 不 己 知 也。」|The Master said, "The superior man is '''distressed''' by his lack of ability. He is not '''distressed''' by men's not knowing him."|ref=Analects}}
